author: marvin
msg: Use non-blocking client sockets in ClusterSearcher.
Change to O_NONBLOCK for client sockets in ClusterSearcher.  This requires a
stupid hack which basically does a CPU-eating blocking loop around a sysread,

author: marvin
msg: Be more tidy about closing sockets.
Detect closed sockets within SearchServer's select loop and remove them from
the select.  Improve shutdown of sockets via both ClusterSearcher#close and

author: marvin
msg: Schedule using select() loop in ClusterSearcher.
Schedule the gathering of responses in ClusterSearcher using a select() loop
to determine when the node is ready to report rather than iterating over nodes
